profile.name: Marcus Chen
profile.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
profile.subtitle: AWS & Azure | DevOps | Platform Engineering
profile.bio:
Passionate cloud architect with 12+ years of experience designing and implementing scalable, resilient infrastructure for enterprise clients. I specialize in cloud-native solutions, infrastructure as code, and helping organizations modernize their technology stack.

I believe in building systems that are not just technically excellent, but also maintainable and cost-effective. My approach combines deep technical expertise with a strong focus on business outcomes.

When I'm not architecting cloud solutions, you'll find me contributing to open-source projects, mentoring junior engineers, or exploring the Swiss Alps.

highlights: Leading cloud transformation initiative for core banking platform serving 2M+ customers
Designed hybrid cloud architecture reducing infrastructure costs by 40%
Established Cloud Center of Excellence with 25 engineers across 4 teams
Implemented zero-trust security model achieving SOC 2 Type II compliance
Reduced deployment frequency from monthly to daily with GitOps practices
Architected multi-region Kubernetes platform handling 50K requests/second
Built CI/CD pipelines reducing release cycle from 2 weeks to 2 hours
Migrated 200+ microservices from on-premise to AWS with zero downtime
Mentored team of 8 engineers in cloud-native development practices
Implemented cost optimization strategies saving €1.2M annually
Designed and maintained infrastructure for real-time data processing platform
Implemented infrastructure as code using Terraform across 3 cloud providers
Built monitoring and alerting system reducing incident response time by 60%
Automated disaster recovery procedures achieving 99.99% uptime SLA
Managed hybrid infrastructure supporting 5,000+ employees globally
Led VMware to container migration project for development environments
Implemented centralized logging and monitoring with ELK stack
Reduced server provisioning time from days to minutes with automation
Supported rapid growth from 50 to 500 servers in AWS
Wrote automation scripts reducing manual tasks by 70%
On-call rotation for production systems serving 1M+ users
